analysis.summary: The 'day' field appears to be a date-related field for tracking completion dates, likely requiring day selection within September 2025
insights: Field name 'day' with context 'date_completion' indicates this is a date type field
The hint suggests this is for selecting a specific day for completion tracking
September 2025 context implies this is for future date scheduling
The field seems to be part of a larger date selection system (potentially alongside month/year fields)
recommendations: Implement as a 'date' field type with day picker functionality
Add validation to ensure selected day is valid for September 2025 (1-30)
Set as high priority since completion dates are typically critical for document processing
Consider implementing a date picker UI component for better user experience
Add validation to prevent selection of past dates if this is for future scheduling
